scope.title: Selectable tables with batch actions
scope.description: Selectable tables allow users to select one or more rows simultaneously and perform batch actions against the selected rows. A batch action is any action that can be performed against any selectable row of a table.

relatedComponents.title: Drawer
relatedComponents.description: A drawer is a panel that slides in from the right side of the screen. The Drawer is overlayed on top of the main area of the page to capture the user’s attention while keeping the context of the current task.

relatedComponents.title: Table
relatedComponents.description: Tables help make complex information easier to scan and compare. Use tables for exact values or information that would be hard to read in body text.
